LightningComponentBundle.description: Shows a header on the community using the default menu to provide links if available

property.name: headerLabel
property.label: Header Label
property.description: The Header Label to display in the header

property.name: headerURL
property.label: Header Navigation URL
property.description: The Navigation URL for the given header, include https:// in starting of a custom url

property.name: serviceName
property.label: Service Name
property.description: The Service Name to display in the header

property.name: serviceURL
property.label: Service Navigation URL
property.description: The Navigation URL for the given Sefvice, include https:// in starting of a custom url

property.name: menuLabel
property.label: Menu label
property.description: The Menu Label for Navigation Items Toggle to display in the header

property.name: navigationMenuDevName
property.label: Standard Navigation Menu Developer Name
property.description: The NavigationMenuDeveloperName which used to get the navigation items
